title: Mangolds
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Western, Buffet, Salad bar, Take-out, Austrian
description: Buffet style counter with selection of daily changing hot dishes, selection of about 40 salads. Limited vegan options. All dishes ingredients labeled, but in German only. There is a separate caf√© counter in the seating area but none of the cakes are vegan. Products without lactose and gluten are available. 30% discount on food after 17.00. Non-smoking. 2 minutes walk from Kunsthaus.
